title: DirectX problem on nvidia
body: Im having this problem for a few days, my video dirver is updated, what to do next?

replies.body:
Do me a quick favor and double check for DirectX Driver updates too! They can have different updates, and it can be pretty easy to forget about DX drivers sometimes, but do be sure to check those. 

If those drivers don't seem to be helping, try troubleshooting your firewalls/antivirus since they can sometimes block newer files. Let me know how that goes!

I didnt play 2 days, now I launched the game and started a custom match, it didnt wanted to load the first time, then it loaded but in low quality and with low resolution, I changed them in the settings and now it works good
I did clean reinstall of the game and when I signed in I got message that Im suspended by leaver buster I tried to play custom game but the same error message appeared

> [{quoted}](name=Cowsep Yi,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OEYGAhLJ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-15T12:33:02.156+0000)
>
> I did clean reinstall of the game and when I signed in I got message that Im suspended by leaver buster I tried to play custom game but the same error message appeared

RIP
DirectX version 11, after the champ select DirectX error window comes out and I cant enter the loading screen, soon leaver buster will suspend me

If it's specifically noting DirectX in that error, but you've updated to the latest build, I'd consider reinstalled that with firewalls/antivirus turned off in the process to be sure it installed correctly. 

I'd also stay away from live matches with others players until it's fixed, of course, queueing up with these problems can still get you hit with leaverbusters and they can't be lifted just because you were troubleshooting. Do **all** of this troubleshooting in custom/practice so you don't get yourself hit with any LPQ's for leaving/not connecting to games when you know there's an issue.
Could you specify what exactly is happening?
